uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.sal.manager.impl
Class RegistryManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.sal.manager.IntegratedComponent
      uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.sal.manager.impl.RegistryManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
iServeComponent, RegistryManager
public class RegistryManagerImpl
extends IntegratedComponent
implements RegistryManager

iServe Manager implementation providing a facade to the entire Storage and Access Layer Delegates the actual implementation to each of the specific managers configured. This class implements the Singleton pattern and takes care of all dependency injection transparently for the user.

Author:
Carlos Pedrinaci (Knowledge Media Institute - The Open University)

Method Detail

registerAsObserver

public void registerAsObserver(Object obj)
Register the given object as an Observer for this iServe instance. All events created within iServe would be notified. Currently based on Guava's EventBus. In order to process them, the corresponding observer should only implement a method that takes as sole parameter the event wanted to process. This method should additionally be annotated with @Subscribe for the system to work.

Specified by:
registerAsObserver in interface RegistryManager
Parameters:
obj - The observer

unregisterObserver

public void unregisterObserver(Object obj)
Unregister observer. Events won't be notified to this observer any longer.

Specified by:
unregisterObserver in interface RegistryManager
Parameters:
obj - The observer

getFilenameFilter

public FilenameFilter getFilenameFilter(String mediaType)
Gets the corresponding filename filter to a given media type by checking both native formats and those supported through transformation

Specified by:
getFilenameFilter in interface RegistryManager
Parameters:
mediaType - the media type for which to obtain the file extension
Returns:
the filename filter or null if it is not supported. Callers are advised to check first that the media type is supported canTransform .

importServices

public List<URI> importServices(InputStream servicesContentStream,
                                String mediaType)
                         throws SalException
Imports a new service within iServe. The original document is stored in the server and the transformed version registered within iServe.

Specified by:

Returns:

clearRegistry

public boolean clearRegistry()
                      throws SalException
Clears the registry entirely: all documents and services are deleted This operation cannot be undone. Use with care.

Specified by:
clearRegistry in interface RegistryManager
Returns:
true if the registry was cleared.
Throws:
SalException

registerServices

public List<URI> registerServices(URI sourceDocumentUri,
                                  String mediaType)
                           throws SalException
Registers all the services found on a given source document. This operation takes care of performing the appropriate format transformation. The source document is not stored on the server. For keeping a copy of the source document within the server use @see importServices instead.

Specified by:
registerServices in interface RegistryManager
Parameters:
sourceDocumentUri -
mediaType -
Returns:
the List of URIs of the services registered
Throws:
SalException

unregisterService

public boolean unregisterService(URI serviceUri)
                          throws SalException
Unregisters a service from the registry. Effectively this will delete the service description and remove any related documents on the server.

Specified by:
unregisterService in interface RegistryManager
Parameters:
serviceUri - the URI of the service to unregister
Returns:
true if it was properly unregistered, false otherwise.
Throws:
SalException

                     throws ServiceException
Exports a given service in the media type requested
